mapper.select: select shopping.*, detail.fileName from t_shopping_goods shopping, t_goods_detail_image detail where shopping.goods_id = detail.goods_id and detail.filetype = 'main_image' and shopping.goods_id = #{goods_id} order by shopping.goods_id

select shopping.*, detail.fileName from t_shopping_goods shopping, t_goods_detail_image detail where shopping.goods_id = detail.goods_id and detail.filetype='main_image' and shopping.goods_title like '%'|| #{searchWord} || '%' order by shopping.goods_creDate desc
select goods_title from t_shopping_goods where goods_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by goods_creDate desc
